origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialSupportAPI.analyze_policy_effect', 'description': 'This function analyzes the effect of a specific financial support policy on a target group, using a chosen method of analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyDocument', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The document or identifier of the financial support policy to analyze.'}, {'name': 'analysisMethod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The method used for analyzing the policy effect, e.g., impact_on_loans, effect_on_revenue.'}, {'name': 'targetGroup', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The group on which the policy effect is analyzed, e.g., SMEs, startups.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'effectAnalysis', 'description': 'The detailed analysis of the policy effect on the target group.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialSupportAPI.analyze_policy_effect, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyDocument'是'latest_SME_support_policy', 'analysisMethod'是'impact_on_loans', 'targetGroup'是'SMEs'.
